item.description: International bank ABN AMRO, a client of our partner Cumquat, is now building their orgcharts using Xopus. Xopus not only provides ABN AMRO with pretty pictures, but also with reusable XML data representing their internal organizational structure.
item.title: Orgcharts for ABN AMRO

item.description: Philips Design chooses Xopus to maintain their web- and intranet sites. Xopus enables them to use XML Schema and XSLT to enforce their strict style guidelines.
item.title: PHILIPS CHOOSES XOPUS

item.description: Wyona is the principal contributor to the Apache Lenya open source project. Wyona delivers state of the art XML based content management solutions and uses Xopus in projects if a powerful XML editor is needed.
item.title: NEW PARTNER: WYONA
